verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Be strong in the Lord and be of good courage
Your mighty defender is always the same

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Mount up with wings as the eagles ascending
Vic'try is sure when you call on His name

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Be strong be strong be strong in the Lord
And be of good courage

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
For He is your guide
Be strong be strong be strong
in the Lord and rejoice for the vic'try is yours

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
So put on the armour the Lord has provided
And place your defense in His unfailing care

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Trust Him for He will be with you in battle
Lightning your path to avoid every snare

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Be strong in the Lord and be of good courage
Your mighty Commander will vanquish the foe

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Fear not the battle for the vic'try is always His
He will protect you wherever you go
